author: IGN
description:
Check out the Cinematic Reveal Trailer for Raven 2, an upcoming dark fantasy MMO RPG developed by Netmarble. Players will dive into the sequel to Raven as a member of the Special Corps bearing the "cursed Stigma". Traverse through an emotional journey to vanquish demons and uncover the secrets behind the world’s fate. Raven 2 is coming soon to mobile and PC.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Raven 2 - Official Cinematic Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Quit Earth. Watch the Borderlands 4 live-action trailer for this upcoming first-person action looter shooter game. Borderlands 4 will be available on PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam) on September 12, 2025, and on Nintendo Switch 2 on October 3, 2025.

In Borderlands 4, explore a dangerous hidden planet Kairos as one of four new badass Vault Hunters. Break free from the oppressive Timekeeper, a ruthless dictator who dominates the masses from on high. Now, a world-altering catastrophe threatens his perfect Order, unleashing mayhem across the planet. Ignite a resistance and blast your way through mechanical monstrosities, bloodthirsty bandits, and vicious beasts, with new traversal mechanics like: double jumping, gliding, dodging, fixed-point grappling, and more.
title: Borderlands 4 - Official 'Quit Earth' Live Action Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Gearbox Main Theater Show live from PAX West! 

Gearback says the show will be packed with "can't miss reveals from Borderlands 4 developers and an update on Risk of Rain 2: Alloyed Collective."

Tune in live Friday August 29 at 1pm PT / 4pm ET. 

#IGN #Gaming #Borderlands4
title: Gearbox Main Theater Show at PAX West Featuring Borderlands 4

author: IGN
description:
Tune in to the MIX Fall Game Showcase 2025 - "spotlighting amazing new and upcoming games releasing for the holidays and beyond from teams around the world!"


Streaming live Friday August 29 at 9am PT / 12pm ET.
title: MIX Fall Game Showcase 2025

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Warhammer: Vermintide 2 trailer to see what to expect with the new Feast of Grimnir limited time, annually recurring event. For the duration of the event, the new event level, ‘The Feast of Grimnir’, will be accessible via the Weekly Event Game Mode. This year's Feast of Grimnir event in Warhammer: Vermintide 2 begins August 26 and will last until September 14, 2025.

Set within a long-abandoned dwarven stronghold, Feast of Grimnir challenges players to prove their worth against towering trolls. The once snowbound halls of the dwarfhold have thawed, revealing sprawling stone corridors, hidden passages, and branching paths for the Heroes to explore. The renowned Cousin Okri even makes a special cameo for the core community, guiding Heroes through the challenge.

During this event, players will be able to earn Shillings by defeating trolls and use them in the in-game store, Lohner's Emporium of Wonders, while enjoying Double XP and the opportunity to claim almost all previ
title: Warhammer Vermintide 2: Feast of Grimnir - Official Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description: No, it's not an out of season April Fool's Joke. Destiny: Rising is a mobile exclusive game developed for those platforms by Netease. If you're a fan of the Bungie-man Destiny franchise but aren't too keen on playing games on your phone or tablet, the developers of Destiny: Rising have actually made it pretty easy to play mobile games on PC. Through Netease's MuMu Player, you can access a virutal Android device that lets you into the Google app store to download anything that you would otherwise only have access to through a phone or tablet. Here's everything you need to play Destiny: Rising on PC.
title: How to Play Destiny: Rising on PC

author: IGN
description: Watch the 1.0.2 Update Gameplay Trailer for Scum, a first-person action survival crafting open-world game developed by Gamepires. Players will set out into the cruel and unforgiving world to scavenge for resources, master cooking recipes, and fight the horde to upgrade bases to properly raid other enemy bases. Scum Update 1.0.2 is available now for PC (Steam).
title: Scum - Official 1.0.2 Update Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description: Don't miss the Global Cinematic Launch Trailer for Destiny: Rising, a third-person mobile addition to the hit sci-fi RPG shooter series developed by NetEase Games. Players can embody a Lightbearer to choose between Titans, Warlocks, and Hunters with unique abilities to take out enemies across a suite of different locations with powerful weapons and gear to attain. Destiny: Rising is available now for iOS and Android.
title: Destiny: Rising - Official Global Cinematic Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
To unlock videos in the Secret Theater in MGS Delta, you have to grab reels from specific enemies by holding them up, and circling around them and aiming at a sensitive area. A lot of these are purposefully placed in zones that make it really hard to do that, so here’s how we unlocked all 15 film reels. Finding these 15 reels, as well as completing the game, will unlock every movie in the Secret Theater.

Timecodes
00:00 - Dremuchij North - The Beginning is the End
00:50 - Dolinovodno (Bridge Area) - Gotcha This Time!
02:32 - Bolshaya Past South - Get Down!
04:08 - Bolshaya Past Base - Payback
05:24 - Ponizovje West - Cat-Like Behavior
07:29 - Ponizovje Warehouse - The Quick Version
09:46 - Graniny Gorki Lab Exterior: Outside Walls - The Joy
11:00 - Svyatogornyj East - Metal Gear S…
12:00 - Krasnogorje Mountain Base - Diehard
14:07 - Krasnogorje Mountaintop - The Ultimate Weapon
15:00 - Groznyj Grad Weapons Lab West Wing Corridor - Made in the U.S.A.
15:54 - Groznyj Grad Torture Room
title: Metal Gear Solid Delta - All Film Reel Locations

author: IGN
description: Karate Survivor is available now on PlayStation, Nintendo Switch, Xbox, and PC. Check out gameplay and more in this Karate Survivor console launch trailer for this survivor-like roguelite inspired by action movies of the ‘80s. Become a martial arts master in Karate Survivor. Use your fists, feet, and the environment to fight off relentless thugs. Master powerful combos, enhance your skills, and remember: everything around you is a weapon!
title: Karate Survivor - Official Console Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Even the best soldiers can miss crucial gear in Metal Gear Solid Delta: Snake Eater. The remake of MGS3 faithfully recreates Snake’s legendary mission, but it’s surprisingly easy to skip powerful weapons, equipment, and uniforms in the opening hours – items that can make boss fights, stealth, and exploration way easier.

In this guide, we’ll show you all the essential early-game gear in both the Virtuous Mission and Operation Snake Eater. From the Thermal Goggles and SVD Sniper Rifle, to rare camo uniforms and extra suppressors, here’s everything you’ll want to grab before moving on.
If you’re jumping into Metal Gear Delta for the first time, or returning after years away, this will make sure you don’t miss a thing.

00:00 - Intro
00:43 - Virtuous Mission + Operation Snake Eater Explained
01:41 - Virtuous Mission - Life Med
01:56 - Virtuous Mission - MK22 Suppressor + Ammo
02:13 - Virtuous Mission - SVD Sniper Rifle
02:17 - Virtuous Mission - Stun Grenades + MK22 Ammo
02:24 - Virtuous
title: Metal Gear Solid Delta: Essential Gear You SHOULDN’T Miss Early On!

author: IGN
description: Destiny: Rising has finally launched globally! If you're one of the few (many) who aren't interested in the game running on phones or tablets, here's 15 Minutes of the newest game in the Destiny franchise running on a PC in 4K.
title: Destiny: Rising Gameplay on PC (Highest Settings at 4K, 60FPS)

author: IGN
description:
They tried to break him. They created The Beast. Years and years of the Baron’s brutal experiments have left you - Kyle Crane - half man, half monster. Escaping the lab isn’t just survival anymore. It’s your first step to revenge. Watch the latest Dying Light: The Beast trailer for the upcoming FPS game to learn about Kyle Cane's suffering at the hands of The Baron. The new Dying Light: The Beast trailer also showcases another look at gameplay and brutal combat. 

Dying Light: The Beast will be available on PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X/S, and PC (Steam and Epic Games Store) on September 19, 2025.

#IGN #DyingLight #DyingLightTheBeast
title: Dying Light: The Beast - Official Part 1: Torture & Suffering Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Firearms Gameplay Trailer for Ghost of Yotei, the upcoming sequel to the third-person melee-based action game developed by Sucker Punch Productions. 

Players can get a look at new gameplay from Ghost of Yotei, featuring the newly added firearms for ranged combat. See Atsu exact revenge from far distances in Ghost of Yotei, launching on October 3 for PlayStation 5 (PS5).

#IGN #GhostOfYotei #SuckerPunchProductions
title: Ghost of Yotei - Official Firearms Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the PC Trailer for Battlefield 6, the upcoming installment to the first-person shooter franchise developed by DICE and EA. 

Players can get the rundown on the updates and features to the PC version, bringing 4K resolution, uncapped frame rates, ultrawide support, and over 600 customization options. The PC version of Battlefield 6 is also fitted with Javelin Anti-Cheat alongside upscaling software, including NVIDIA DLSS, Intel XeSS, and AMD FSR. Battlefield 6 is launching on October 10 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

#IGN #Battlefield6 #DICE
title: Battlefield 6 - Official PC Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Year 2 Trailer for Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2, a first-person action shooter developed by Saber Interactive. 

Players can attain new content as part for the Year 2 offering, including new game modes, Operations, PvP arenas, enemy beasts to slay, weapons, and more. Newcomers and longtime fans alike can also access the Techmarine class for a new way to play alongside cosmetics with the Season Pass 2 to unlock customizable options to set your Space Marine apart from the batch. 

All of the content will be released from Patch 10 to Patch 15, with Patch 10 launching on September 4 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

#IGN #Warhammer40k #Spacemarine2
title: Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2 - Official Year 2 Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the One-Punch Man Skin Reveal Trailer for Fortnite, the hit third-person action battle royale game developed by Epic Games. 

Players can now embody the iconic anime hero Saitama, also known as One-Punch Man, alongside the young cyborg Genos and the Terrible Tornado. The One-Punch Man skins are available now in Fortnite.

#IGN #Fortnite #OnePunchMan
title: Fortnite - Official One-Punch Man Skin Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Cayo Perico Zombie Survival Trailer for GTA Online, the hit third-person action online shooter experience developed by Rockstar Games. 

Players can fight the undead with the Cayo Perico Zombie Survival mode that turns an island paradise into a deadly nightmare. Fight waves of the undead to make it to the airstrip to evacuate and survive at all costs. The Cayo Perico Zombie Survival mode is available now in GTA Online.

#IGN #GrandTheftAuto #GTA
title: GTA Online - Official Cayo Perico Zombie Survival Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the latest Pokémon Legends: Z-A trailer featuring Hawlucha and Machamp. Pokémon Legends: Z-A will be available on Nintendo Switch and Nintendo Switch 2 on October 16, 2025.

Can the bond between Hawlucha and its Trainer be enough to take down the formidable Machamp? One thing is for sure—when these two strong Fighting-type Pokémon enter the ring, fists will fly!

#IGN #Pokemon #PokemonLegendsZA
title: Pokemon Legends: Z-A - Official 'Full Match: Hawlucha vs. Machamp!' Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Bad Man is an upcoming action comedy  starring Seann William Scott, Johnny Simmons, Rob Riggle, and Kaitlin Doubleday. 

In Colt Lake, Tennessee, Sam Evans (Johnny Simmons) attempts to tackle a meth epidemic. He is sidelined when the undercover agent, Bobby Gaines (Seann William Scott) arrives. With Gaines being heralded as a hero, Evans begins to suspect that maybe Gaines isn't the good guy he appears to be, and begins to unravel a complex web of stories. 

Bad Man is slated to premiere at the Sidewalk Film Festival on August 24, 2025.

#IGN #BadMan #ActionComedyMovies
title: Bad Man - Official Trailer (2025) Seann William Scott, Johnny Simmons, Rob Riggle

author: IGN
description:
Finally, after years of waiting, Warhammer 40,000 Dawn of War 4 brings the classic 40k RTS series back to life. And new developer KING Art Games is delivering just what fans have been asking for: a return to the classic base building and epic army clashes of the original Dawn of War. IGN has played a mission at gamescom 2025, taking command of the Blood Raven Space Marines, and we're impressed with how authentic this Games Workshop strategy game feels.

Warhammer 40,000 Dawn of War 4 will launch in 2026 with four narrative campaigns, one for each faction - Space Marines, Orks, Necrons, and Adeptus Mechanicus. It will also feature co-op and multiplayer modes, including the return of fan-favourite Last Stand mode. 

Warhammer 40,000 Dawn of War 4 is coming to PC in 2026.

#IGN #Warhammer #40K #DawnOfWar4
title: Warhammer 40k Dawn of War 4 Goes Back to Its Roots

author: IGN
description: Enjoy the new gameplay trailer for Long Drive North, the upcoming four-player co-op RV survival game where you and up to three of your friends hunt, cook, and keep your vehicle roadworthy in a post-disaster, open-world American wilderness. Long Drive North will launch in Steam Early Access in November 2025. Wishlist it on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3179350
title: Long Drive North - Official Release Window Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Mega Hawlucha Reveal Trailer for Pokemon Legends: Z-A, the latest installment in the creature-collecting and battling franchise developed by Game Freak. 

Players can check out the newly discovered Mega-Evolved Pokemon with Mega Hawlucha entering the game with vibrant colors and bird-like features. Mega Hawlucha is launching with Pokemon Legends: Z-A on October 16 for Nintendo Switch and Nintendo Switch 2.

#IGN #Pokemon #PokemonLegendsZA
title: Pokemon Legends: Z-A Official Mega Hawlucha Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Dust Devils Warbond Trailer for Helldivers 2, the hit third-person action adventure co-op shooter developed by Arrowhead Game Studios. 

Players can soon get access to the new Dust Devils Warbond, packed with a plethora of different explosive weaponry, armor, and more. Make use of the AR-2 Coyote Assault Rifle, the S-11 Speargun Stratagem, the G-7 Pineapple Grenade, and more with the Dust Devils Warbond for Helldivers 2, launching on September 4 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

#IGN #Helldivers2 #arrowheadstudios
title: Helldivers 2 - Official Dust Devils Warbond Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Insatiable Bloodsuckers have swarmed your Kingdom, carrying with them the dreaded Crimson Curse. Contain the spread, find the cure, and eradicate these vampirically-corrupted nobles before it’s too late. The third Kingdoms adventure module is coming to Darkest Dungeon 2. Check out the latest Darkest Dungeon 2: Kingdoms trailer for the RPG roguelike to see what you can expect with Curse of the Court, which introduces Crimson Courtiers. 

In addition to a new enemy faction and question, the update also includes new achievements to earn and three new Kingdoms maps, featuring unique layouts each with their own set of challenges. The new maps are playable on any of the three different Kingdoms modules.

Darkest Dungeon 2: Kingdom's Curse of the Court update will be available on PC and Mac on August 28, 2025.
title: Darkest Dungeon 2: Kingdoms - Official Curse of the Court Trailer
